The Earth's temperature would decrease, leading to a of ice caps and glaciers.
The oceans would rise, leading to flooding and erosion of coastal cities.
The ecosystem would be thrown off balance, leading to the extinction of many species.
The weather patterns would change, leading to more frequent and severe natural disasters such as hurricanes, tornadoes, and earthquakes.
The global population would decrease, as many people would be unable to survive the changes brought about by climate change.
